author: Epic Games
description:
The original Match-3 RPG is back and bigger than ever! Puzzle Quest: Immortal Edition is out now on Epic Games Store! https://epic.gm/pq-immortal

Puzzle Quest: Immortal Edition contains the original Puzzle Quest: Challenge of Warlords, Revenge of the Plague Lord, and The Legend Returns. What's more, enjoy all-new content, including a new class, and upgraded visuals to 4K. 

This really is the definitive Puzzle Quest experience. 
Are you ready to save the kingdom of Etheria? It's time to find out!
title: Puzzle Quest: Immortal Edition | Launch Trailer
